Description: Fragment of green faience ring bezel, about half of the bezel and a quarter of the ring is preserved, the bezel is very flat, it shows hieroglyphs in form of a sun disc, underneath a seated mAa.t with the feather and an ankh right of mAa.t. The ankh sign is very slender and is parallel to the deity, end is broken off. Not very high quality of the faience resulting in a small crack of the surface.
Bibliographic references: Spencer 1997 / Amara West I, The Architectural Report (p. 65)
